attributes.action: prohibit the 'americanisation' of dates and times by politicians and the media
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM should encourage the correct use of English and dating convention by politicians and the media so that events like the bombings of 7th July are not americanised and referred to as 7/7 or July 7 - nor should terms such as 24/7 be used.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
